channel.title: Janifr Contributions
channel.description:
Hi,
I just uploaded my version of a drawbar organ to the community library. Key features at this point are full polyphony with all 91 voices, 2nd/3rd harmonic percussion, pop-free note-ons and note-offs using weighted averaging of gain per sample and upper foldback. I also implemented some sort of key-klick emulation but it's not very good at the moment.

item.title: Janifr Contributions
item.dc:creator: @janifr
item.description:
@janifr wrote:

New version of drawbar organ patch based on work of Johannes' and others. Key features: harmonic percussion, harmonic leakage, adjustable treble portion of tonegenerator calibration curve, switchable manual tapering, and last but not least emulation of swell pedal by adjusting cut-off frequency of output amplifier.

Read full topic

item.title: Janifr Contributions
item.dc:creator: @janifr
item.description:
@janifr wrote:

Vibrato scanner and manual tapering added.

Read full topic
